name: opflow-website
description: Static structure clone scaffolding and QA checks

scripts.serve:random:
python3 - <<'PY'
import socket, subprocess
with socket.socket() as s:
    s.bind(('', 0))
    port = s.getsockname()[1]
print(f'Serving at http://127.0.0.1:{port}')
subprocess.run(['python3', '-m', 'http.server', str(port)], check=False)
PY
scripts.qa: npm run check:links && npm run check:top-btn && npm run check:metadata && npm run check:post-alias && npm run check:markdown-source
